p: Soft gelatin capsule was made using the rotary die process ( Figure 1). In this formulation, traditional cinnamon oil was inserted into soft shell consist of gelatin, water, plasticizers, and preservative. The final capsule was standardized based on its cinnamaldehyde amount (55â€“75% of cinnamaldehyde as the significant pharmacological component of cinnamon essential oil) and analyzed by high-performance liquid chromatography (HPLC) method.
